title: Wts: T206 ty cobb (bat off) vg condition, SOLD!!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: Wts: T206 ty cobb (bat off) vg condition, SOLD!!
posts.post_content: Card is well centered with slight diamond cut. Small crease in bottom left corner, does not go thru the back,  back has a small mark on the letter "d" of piedmont with some slight staining around that area. there is also a fading between the letters "l" and "i" in the word quality, but it does not appear to be paper loss.  Back is piedmont 350-460, beautiful color and sharp focus. The card is a great value at the price, detailed scans available, just send me your email address. First $625 gets it!! Thanks, pay pal gift at this price. PRICE IS ACTUALLY $585!! THANKS  **SOLD**
Andy- scans sent, thanks for the inquiry- kevin
John- pm sent, thanks for the offer, i would take $585 and take care of the postage. To be fair to other net54 members, i am going to adjust price. Please let me know. Thanks
